review: It's a well designed and clever piece of technology.  .  Until a lot more apps and site support Chromecast, it will be of limited us.The setup is easy for wireless applications but it's not obvious how to get a wired device on your network to join in the fun.Only by Googling a solution did I discover how to get Chrome to play an MP4.  It can't play AVI's so I cant 'chrome cast' them.The device itself gets very hot while powered up, so I power it off a USB outlet on my TV.  That way it is powered off when my TV is, rather than constantly cooking while being powered by mains electric.
